law.catch_line: The head of the Office is the Director, who shall be appointed by the Executive Director, subject to...

text.section: The head of the Office is the Director, who shall be appointed by the Executive Director, subject to the approval of the President and the Speaker.
The Director serves without a fixed term and may be removed by the Executive Director, subject to the approval of the President and the Speaker.
The Director is entitled to the salary provided in the State budget.
